name: RMC Imprint Radio
description: RMC (Reaching Mankind for Christ) 101.5 FM & Internet Radio is a Christian Ministry Stationed in South Sudan border Nimule neighboring Uganda Amuru District

name: 96.3 Favour Fm Juba
description:
Favour FM is a dynamic faith-based community radio registered with the both the National communication Authority and the Media authority. We have been in operation since 2018, and since then, have amassed a wide range of loyal listenership majority of who are middle-aged, these are people who have not been catered for by the urban commercial radio stations.
Favour FM radio program is designed to reach the people of every village and tribe in South Sudan with the Gospel in their own language, customs and culture.
